title: Daily Review with Clay and Buck - Nov 5 2021
itunes:title: Daily Review with Clay and Buck - Nov 5 2021
description:
1776 Project PAC Founder Ryan Girdusky talked about how critical race policies are being implemented in schools across America. Clay and Buck outline the latest woke craziness, this time out of Microsoft in Seattle, where they’re introducing themselves not just by preferred pronouns, but also visual descriptions and ethnic backgrounds. Former Trump Advisor Peter Navarro, author of “In Trump Time: A Journal of America's Plague Year” talks about Covid and the Trump presidency- and why Dr. Fauci should be fired. Alex Berenson talks about the latest in the Covid wars, including his reaction to sound bites from CDC Director Rochelle Walensky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
